snippet: Stephen Howells and Nicole Vaisey received maximum sentences for abducting and abusing the girls in northern New York last year and for sexually exploiting six children total.
abstract: Nicole Vaisey and Stephen Howells are sentenced to life in prison for kidnapping two Amish sisters in New York and sexually abusing them; couple admitted to sexually exploiting total of six children.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Howells and Nicole Vaisey received maximum sentences for abducting and abusing the girls in northern New York last year and for sexually exploiting six children total.

headline.main: Couple Who Abducted 2 Amish Sisters Receive Lifetime Sentences
headline.print_headline: Lifetime Sentences for Couple Who Abducted 2 Amish Sisters
